Audit:
# Ansible managed
# Manual customization of this file is not recommended.
*filter
:INPUT ACCEPT [0:0]
:FORWARD ACCEPT [0:0]
:OUTPUT ACCEPT [0:0]
-A INPUT -m state --state RELATED,ESTABLISHED -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -p icmp --icmp-type timestamp-request -j DROP
-A INPUT -p icmp -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -i lo -j ACCEPT
##################################################################
################## SSH ##################
# SSH_VLAN48 ip's
-A INPUT -m state --state NEW -m tcp -p tcp -s 10.30.48.0/24 --dport 22 -j ACCEPT
# NESSUS_VLAN48 ip's
-A INPUT -m state --state NEW -m tcp -p tcp -s 10.30.48.3 --dport 22 -j ACCEPT
###NRPE
-A INPUT -m state --state NEW -m tcp -p tcp -s 10.30.48.171 --dport 5666 -j ACCEPT
###SNMP-CACTI
-A INPUT -m state --state NEW -m udp -p udp -s 10.30.48.171 --dport 161 -j ACCEPT
##################  STREAMS_REACT  ##################
#BARRACUDA_VLAN48 ip's
-A INPUT -p tcp -m state --state NEW -m tcp -s 10.30.48.5,10.30.48.6 --dport 4010 -j ACCEPT
##################################################################
-A INPUT -j REJECT --reject-with icmp-host-prohibited
-A FORWARD -j REJECT --reject-with icmp-host-prohibited
COMMIT
